source: ## Load Source Data from the Datalake

# The scource files are uncommented for the Productionized run (Remove the `#` when troubleshooting these scripts)

#dboparcel = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboparcel.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboparcel.createOrReplaceTempView("dboparcel")

#dboParcel_Archive = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboParcel_Archive.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboParcel_Archive.createOrReplaceTempView("dboParcel_Archive")

#dboconsignment = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboconsignment.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboconsignment.createOrReplaceTempView("dboconsignment")

#dbodb_InServiceReason = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbodb_InServiceReason.parquet', format='parquet')
#dbodb_InServiceReason.createOrReplaceTempView("dbodb_InServiceReason")

#dboLoads = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboLoads.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboLoads.createOrReplaceTempView("dboLoads")

#dboLocation = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboLocation.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboLocation.createOrReplaceTempView("dboLocation")

#dboWaybill = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboWaybill.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboWaybill.createOrReplaceTempView("dboWaybill")

#dboorder = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboorder.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboorder.createOrReplaceTempView("dboorder")
## Provide the final structure to ORDERSERVICELEVEL

ORDERSERVICELEVEL = spark.sql("""

SELECT `OrderID` AS `SL_OD_ID`,
`MinHODateTime` AS `SL_OD_HODateTime`,
`MaxPODDateTime` AS `SL_OD_MaxPODDateTIme`,
`MinDeliverByDateTime` AS `SL_OD_MinDeliverByDateTime`,
`InserviceIndicatorOrder` AS `SL_OD_InserviceIndicatorOrder`,
`InserviceStatusOrder` AS `SL_OD_InserviceStatusOrder`,
`LeadTimeBasedonPOD` AS `SL_OD_LeadTimeBasedonPOD`,
IF(`LeadTimeBasedonPOD` = -99999,'Not Received',
IF(`LeadTimeBasedonPOD` = -88888,'Not Delivered',
IF(`LeadTimeBasedonPOD` < 12,'< 12 hrs',
IF(`LeadTimeBasedonPOD` < 24,'< 24 hrs',
IF(`LeadTimeBasedonPOD` < 48,'< 2 days',
IF(`LeadTimeBasedonPOD` < 72,'< 3 days',
IF(`LeadTimeBasedonPOD` < 96,'< 4 days',
IF(`LeadTimeBasedonPOD` < 120,'< 5 days',
IF(`LeadTimeBasedonPOD` < 144,'< 6 days',
IF(`LeadTimeBasedonPOD` < 168,'< 7 days',
'> 7 days')))))))))) AS `SL_OD_AgeAnalysisBasedonPOD`,
IF(LeadTimeBasedonPOD IN (-99999,-88888),0,1) AS SL_OD_LeadDaysIncludeFlag
FROM(
SELECT DISTINCT

p.OrderID
,MIN(o.HODate) MinHODateTime
,MAX(w.PODDate) MaxPODDateTime 
,MIN(
		CASE 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (1, 2,3,4)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,9),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,9,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (5,6)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,11),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,11,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (7)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,10),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,10,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (3,4,5,6) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,6),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,6,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (1,2) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,4),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,4,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (7) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,5),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,5,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			ELSE c.DeliverBy
		END
	) MinDeliverByDateTime
,CASE 
	WHEN coalesce(MAX(w.PODDate),current_date) <= MIN(
		CASE 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (1, 2,3,4)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,9),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,9,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (5,6)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,11),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,11,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (7)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,10),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,10,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (3,4,5,6) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,6),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,6,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (1,2) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,4),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,4,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (7) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,5),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,5,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			ELSE c.DeliverBy
		END
	) THEN 1
	ELSE 0
END InserviceIndicatorOrder

,CASE
	WHEN MAX(w.PODDate) IS NULL THEN 'In Transit'
	WHEN MAX(w.PODDate) <= MIN(
		CASE 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (1, 2,3,4)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,9),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,9,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (5,6)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,11),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,11,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (7)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,10),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,10,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (3,4,5,6) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,6),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,6,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (1,2) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,4),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,4,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (7) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,5),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,5,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			ELSE c.DeliverBy
		END
	) THEN 'Delivered: In Service'
	ELSE 'Delivered: Out of Service'
END InserviceStatusOrder

,CASE
	WHEN MIN(c.CDate) IS NULL THEN -99999
	WHEN MAX(w.PODDate) IS NULL THEN -88888
	WHEN MIN(c.CDATE) = MAX(w.PODDate) THEN 0 --MIN(FLOOR(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate))))) = MAX(FLOOR(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,w.PODDate))))) THEN 0
	ELSE (unix_timestamp(MAX(w.PODDate)) - unix_timestamp(to_timestamp(date_add(MIN(c.CDate),1)) - INTERVAL '0.001' SECOND))/3600
     ---CONVERT(FLOAT,(MAX(w.PODDate) -  DATEADD(ms, -2, DATEADD(DAY,DATEDIFF(DAY,-1,MIN(c.CDate)),0))))*24
END LeadTimeBasedonPOD

FROM dboparcel p
LEFT JOIN dboorder o ON o.id = p.OrderID
LEFT JOIN dboWaybill w ON w.id = p.WaybillID
LEFT JOIN dboconsignment c ON c.id = p.ConsignID
GROUP BY p.OrderID

UNION ALL

SELECT DISTINCT

p.OrderID
,MIN(o.HODate) MinHODateTime
,MAX(w.PODDate) MaxPODDateTime 
,MIN(
		CASE 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (1, 2,3,4)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,9),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,9,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (5,6)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,11),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,11,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (7)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,10),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,10,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (3,4,5,6) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,6),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,6,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (1,2) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,4),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,4,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (7) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,5),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,5,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			ELSE c.DeliverBy
		END
	) MinDeliverByDateTime
,CASE 
	WHEN coalesce(MAX(w.PODDate),current_date) <= MIN(
		CASE 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (1, 2,3,4)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,9),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,9,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (5,6)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,11),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,11,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (7)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,10),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,10,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (3,4,5,6) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,6),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,6,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (1,2) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,4),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,4,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (7) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,5),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,5,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			ELSE c.DeliverBy
		END
	) THEN 1
	ELSE 0
END InserviceIndicatorOrder

,CASE
	WHEN MAX(w.PODDate) IS NULL THEN 'In Transit'
	WHEN MAX(w.PODDate) <= MIN(
		CASE 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (1, 2,3,4)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,9),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,9,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (5,6)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,11),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,11,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN o.BillCustID = 1167320 AND c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (7)
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,10),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,10,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126) 
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (3,4,5,6) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,6),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,6,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (1,2) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,4),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,4,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			WHEN c.DeliverBy IS NULL AND weekofyear(c.CDate) IN (7) 
                THEN to_timestamp(CONCAT(date_add(c.CDate,5),'T23:59:59.000')) --CONVERT(DATETIME,(DATEADD(SECOND,-1,(DATEADD(DAY,5,CEILING(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate)))))))),126)
			ELSE c.DeliverBy
		END
	) THEN 'Delivered: In Service'
	ELSE 'Delivered: Out of Service'
END InserviceStatusOrder

,CASE
	WHEN MIN(c.CDate) IS NULL THEN -99999
	WHEN MAX(w.PODDate) IS NULL THEN -88888
	WHEN MIN(c.CDATE) = MAX(w.PODDate) THEN 0 --MIN(FLOOR(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,c.CDate))))) = MAX(FLOOR(CONVERT(FLOAT,(CONVERT( DATETIME,w.PODDate))))) THEN 0
	ELSE (unix_timestamp(MAX(w.PODDate)) - unix_timestamp(to_timestamp(date_add(MIN(c.CDate),1)) - INTERVAL '0.001' SECOND))/3600
     ---CONVERT(FLOAT,(MAX(w.PODDate) -  DATEADD(ms, -2, DATEADD(DAY,DATEDIFF(DAY,-1,MIN(c.CDate)),0))))*24
END LeadTimeBasedonPOD

FROM dboParcel_Archive p
LEFT JOIN dboorder o ON o.id = p.OrderID
LEFT JOIN dboWaybill w ON w.id = p.WaybillID
LEFT JOIN dboconsignment c ON c.id = p.ConsignID
GROUP BY p.OrderID)a

""")
#ORDERSERVICELEVEL.show()
ORDERSERVICELEVEL.createOrReplaceTempView("ORDERSERVICELEVEL")
## Print success message on the Production Script
